title: spIBDverse functions and shiny apps
text: basic example shows solve common problem:

title: create_ibd_network — create_ibd_network
code: create_ibd_network(   ibd_file,   meta_file = NULL,   ibd_co,   frac_co = 0.49,   only_connected = TRUE )

title: create_ibd_network — create_ibd_network
text: ibd_file TSV file IBD data meta_file TSV node metadata ibd_co vector cutoffs defining edge frac_co cutoff quality control only_connected boolean remove unconnected nodes

title: example network — example_network
text: igraph object site Site sample levels , B, C genetic Genetic sex sample levels F M

title: get_network_measures — get_network_measures
text: g igraph object measure centrality measure use var vertex variables stratify

title: get_network_measures — get_network_measures
code: get_network_measures(example_network, var = "site") #> # A tibble: 3 × 2 #>   site  `mean (degree)` #>   <chr>           <dbl> #> 1 A                3.77 #> 2 B                4.64 #> 3 C                9.75

title: plot ggnet — plot_ggnet
code: plot_ggnet(   ggnet_obj,   fill_col = "",   shape_col = "",   node_size = 4,   text_size = 4,   labels = FALSE,   label_inc = "",   label_exc = "",   connected = TRUE )

title: plot ggnet — plot_ggnet
text: ggnet_obj ggnetwork dataframe fill_col vertex attribute node fill shape_col vertex attribute node shape node_size node size text_size label size labels add labels label_inc regular expression include labels label_exc regular expression exclude labels connected boolean include isolated nodes

title: plot ggnet — plot_ggnet
code: example_ggnet <- ggnetwork::ggnetwork(example_network) plot_ggnet(example_ggnet) #> Warning: Removed 167 rows containing missing values or values outside the scale range #> (`geom_text()`).
